resources.string:
You can save teams and players.
 
 Go to the Teams section to manage teams.
 New team can be added in two ways:
 1. in Teams section;
 2. after the game when you start a new game.
 
 In Teams section you can look at the team stats and manage players.
 
 The choice of the team for a game is possible in three ways:
 1. select when starting new game;
 2. by long pressing team name;
 3. from the side panels by group adding.
 
 If there are to many players in team for the current game type (12 for basketball and 4 for streetball) a dialog for selecting players for the game will be displayed.
 If there are to few players in team for the current game type a warning dialog will be displayed but you can start the game.

 What information we collect
 To use the application, you do not need to create an account.
 The app does not collect any personal information and does not transmit any information to other devices or services.
 The local store contains data related only application functionality.
 No information about the device is not going.
 The required permissions (to use the camera, record to local storage) are used to maintain the history in the app.

After adding the players and choice of active players each button on the main screen will be assigned to the relevant player.
 When changing score or foul click on player button to apply the action to the player.
